info.name: Spinal cord, anterior median fissure
info.description: The anterior median fissure of the spinal cord is AKA ventral median fissure. It is a deep fissure separating the two ventral or anterior columns of the spinal cord. This fissure extends into the medulla and stops at the caudal aspect of the pons. It is interrupted by pyramidal decussation at the junction of the spinal cord with the medulla.
